Class Invoice

java.lang.Object
Invoice
public class Invoice extends Object
The `Invoice` class represents an invoice for ticket purchases and contains relevant details. It provides methods to manage invoice information and display it on the console.
Since:
November 19, 2023

    • Invoice

      public Invoice(Event event, int ticketType, int ticketQuantity, double totalPrice, String confirmationNumber, Customer customer, double subtotal, double taxes, double charityFee, double serviceFee, double convenienceFee)
      Constructs an `Invoice` object with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      event - The event associated with this invoice.
      ticketType - The ticket type (represented by an int) for this invoice.
      ticketQuantity - The quantity of tickets for this invoice.
      totalPrice - The total price of the tickets in this invoice.
      confirmationNumber - The confirmation number for this invoice.
      customer - The customer associated with this invoice.
      taxes - The amount of taxes associated with this invoice.
